thread.title: Emma Stone on Best Picture Mystery: "I Was Holding My Best Actress Card"
thread.title_full: Emma Stone on Best Picture Mystery: "I Was Holding My Best Actress Card"

title: Emma Stone on Best Picture Mystery: "I Was Holding My Best Actress Card"
text:
COMMENTS Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway presented the award to 'La La Land,' before it was revealed that 'Moonlight' had won. 
Emma Stone was just as confused as viewers nationwide when presenters Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway mistakenly announced that La La Land had won the best picture award, before realizing that Moonlight had actually won. 
Backstage after the show, during which she won an Oscar for best actress, Stone told reporters that she was happy for the Moonlight cast despite the flub. 
"I f—ing love Moonlight," she said. "Of course it was an amazing thing to hear them say La La Land , we would have loved best picture, but we're so happy for Moonlight ." 
Beatty explained onstage that the mess-up had been caused by the pair receiving the wrong envelope. He clarified that he had been handed the envelope for best actress, rather than best picture. "I opened the envelope and it said Emma Stone, La La Land . That's why I looked at Faye, and at you. I wasn't trying to be funny," he admitted. 
On Beatty's explanation, Stone noted, "I also was holding my best actress in a leading role card that entire time. I don't mean to start stuff, but whatever story that was…" 
Stone's stunned reaction to the mishap was captured by viewers on Twitter. When Emma Stone realizes the twist ending #Oscars #BestPicture pic.twitter.com/nkm1nDLnmE — Marion Maitland (@nadatostada) February 27, 2017 
The Academy appeared to have handed two best actress envelopes to presenters Leonardo DiCaprio (who presented the best actress category) and Beatty and Dunaway. A close-up of the envelope in Beatty's hand shows it was indeed for best actress. Me and @manraysky went back and looked; Warren Beatty totally has the wrong envelope. "Actress in a Leading Role" pic.twitter.com/IqSSC5QMzH — Beloved By Reddit (@pablohidalgo) February 27, 2017 
The 89th annual Academy Awards, hosted by Jimmy Kimmel, took place at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood on Sunday.
